topic.title: Sectiondiv testing
topic.shortdesc: The <sectiondiv> element allows logical grouping of content within a section. There is no additional meaning associated with the sectiondiv element, aside from its function as a container for other content. The sectiondiv element does not contain a title; the lowest level of titled content within a topic is the section itself. If additional hierarchy is required, nested topics should be used in place of the section.

body.p: PDF output will generate fo:wrapper for <sectiondiv>.

sectiondiv.p: Friends of mine really love their hedgehogs.
Lots of people want ponies when they grow up.
